ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver
Class SimpleAppServer

java.lang.Object
  endpoint.Endpoint
      endpoint.LocalEndpoint
          ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.SimpleAppServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
coap.MessageHandler, coap.MessageReceiver
public class SimpleAppServer
extends endpoint.LocalEndpoint

A console based application that simulates an app server and runs a JavaScriptApp specified in the arguments given in the main method.

Start SimpleAppServer with 

 java -cp bin/;lib/js-14.jar;lib/Californium.jar;lib/E4XUtils.jar ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.SimpleAppServer appserver/installed/storage.js -name ABC

Author:
Martin Lanter
